summary: Fols 4-92, a set of Homilies for Saints days, followed by a description of the resting places of the Saints in England. Written in two hands, origin unknown (Ker 1957, p. 298). The manuscript is badly burned.

admin: Described by Owen Roberson with the assistance of Sanne van der Schee, with reference to published scholarship (2010; 2013). Transcription is based on Doane 2010 and Ker 1957, as the text is illegible on microfiche.
